obfuscation: ﻿ My about important piece of furniture The most powerful influences in our communities is television .
original: ﻿ My most important piece of furniture  The most powerful influences in our communities is television.

obfuscation: More people rely on TV than newspapers , radio and the Internet combined .
original: More people rely on TV than newspapers, radio and the Internet combined.

obfuscation: In the following paragraphs I will discuss different ways television affects me and how the different programs make me feel .
original: In the following paragraphs I will discuss different ways television affects me and how the different programs make me feel.

obfuscation: I will also reflect how it would be like having no TV in my life and speculate what I would do rather of watching television and weigh the pros and cons .
original: I will also reflect how it would be like having no TV in my life and speculate what I would do instead of watching television and weigh the pros and cons.

obfuscation: I watch films , soap operas and talk shows first , because I love spending hour after hour in front of the television watching programs that in fact give me absolutely nothing but some kind of perverse satisfaction .
original: I watch films, soap operas and talk shows first, because I love spending hour after hour in front of the television watching programs that in fact give me absolutely nothing but some kind of perverse satisfaction.

obfuscation: Talk shows constitute a good example of this where peoples ' personal problems make me feel good about myself .
original: Talk shows constitute a good example of this where peoples' personal problems make me feel good about myself.

obfuscation: I feel good watching all the fat and dumb people in e.g .
original: I feel good watching all the fat and dumb people in e.g.

obfuscation: Ricky Lake and laugh at their problems and silliness .
original: Ricky Lake and laugh at their problems and silliness.

obfuscation: I also like dramas and Spelling-produced series where I can follow the glamorous life of rich and famous people and where I for an hour or two can enter into a world far away from the normal dull working day .
original: I also like dramas and Spelling-produced series where I can follow the glamorous life of rich and famous people and where I for an hour or two can enter into a world far away from the normal dull working day.

obfuscation: However , these programs are plainly entertainment and I get absolutely nothing useful out of them and after switching the TV off I 'm neither wiser nor dumber .
original: However, these programs are plainly entertainment and I get absolutely nothing useful out of them and after switching the TV off I'm neither wiser nor dumber.

obfuscation: I 'm watching these programs only as a pastime .
original: I'm watching these programs only as a pastime.

obfuscation: I have to admit that me watching mentioned programs is nothing I like other people to know .
original: I have to admit that me watching mentioned programs is nothing I like other people to know.

obfuscation: Therefore I only watch them when I 'm home alone .
original: Therefore I only watch them when I'm home alone.

obfuscation: When I hear the key in the door and person is coming home I quickly swap the channel to the news or something else .
original: When I hear the key in the door and someone is coming home I quickly swap the channel to the news or something else.

obfuscation: I ca n't really explain this , it 's just that I feel stupid watching junk .
original: I can't really explain this, it's just that I feel stupid watching junk.

obfuscation: I watch news , documentaries and nature programs next , because in contrast to junk entertainment these programs after watching them , enrich me and make me feel that I learn some significant things .
original: I watch news, documentaries and nature programs next, because in contrast to junk entertainment these programs after watching them, enrich me and make me feel that I learn some important things.

obfuscation: farther more I also want to keep up with everything that happens in the world .
original: Further more I also want to keep up with everything that happens in the world.

obfuscation: I think watching TV is a good way of learning different things and get familiar to other cultures and ways of living .
original: I think watching TV is a good way of learning different things and get familiar to other cultures and ways of living.

obfuscation: Almost everything I know about animals and nature for example comes from nature programs from all over the world .
original: Almost everything I know about animals and nature for example comes from nature programs from all over the world.

obfuscation: A good way of learning English is by watching TV which is something that ca n't be underestimated .
original: A good way of learning English is by watching TV which is something that can't be underestimated.

obfuscation: When Swedes go abroad they much receive compliments for their good knowledge of the English language .
original: When Swedes go abroad they often receive compliments for their good knowledge of the English language.

obfuscation: Germans do n't and the reason is -among others- that all foreign films on German television are dubbed .

obfuscation: In Sweden this exercise is nonexistent with the exception of some programs for children .

original: Further more old and disabled people use television as a substitute for travelling thus getting a chance to explore the world from their living rooms.

obfuscation: It 's hard to imagine how my life would be without TV .
original: It's hard to imagine how my life would be without TV.

original: What I would miss is firstly the news as I prefer watching them on TV rather than reading the news in magazines and newspapers.

obfuscation: Pictures stick easier in the memory than text Secondly I would miss an comfortable way of relaxing and disconnecting my brain .
original: Pictures stick easier in the memory than text Secondly I would miss an easy way of relaxing and disconnecting my brain.

original: Instead of watching TV I would probably read a book and that's not as relaxing as entertainment on television can be.

obfuscation: However I must admit that I sometimes let the television control my life .
original: However I must admit that I sometimes let the television control my life.

original: If I for example follow a TV series, I can't plan anything else the day the series are on.
